Header: 11 Division Entertains All Ranks & Family Members
Content: 11 Division Headquarters with a view to promoting goodwill and understanding among All Ranks and family members organized a special get-together for officers and Other Ranks of under command establishments on Saturday (28) with family members near the Gregory Lake in Nuwara Eliya. The event was graced by the Major General W.G.H.A.S Bandara, General Officer Commanding, 11 Division, 111 Brigade Commander & 112 Brigade Commander together with Commanding Officers of under command battalions. During the meet, all were entertained to lunch and refreshments.
